Html:
Hello. Sorry if this is something that's already been answered but I have been unable to find any topics more recent than 2009 with the keywords I tried.

Once you have an upgrade list (specifically, a progressive upgrade list), is there any way to export that list into a format that can be imported by the Rawr Addon?  

If so, how?

If not, are there any plans to support something like the old "Export to Lootplan" option (I'm assuming it'd just export to the rawr addon nowadays).

 

Thanks.
It's definitely planned. I'm currently still using Lootplan, but I'll try to get this in when I have some time if someone doesn't beat me to it.
It is on the todo list for Rawr.Addon however I've not looked at how best to achieve it yet.
